summary: Separates hoods from masks making them wearable together or apart in any combination. "Apophysis Dragon Priest Masks" and "Psychosteves DragonPriest Masks" FRIENDLY! No clipping issues!
descriptionHtml:
Always hated hoods on vanilla masks. Found few mods made to remove those hoods, but they was not perfect. There was clipping issues and etc. Decided to make that myself. If you like the idea of real hoodless masks, go to the download section.

[b]WHAT IT DOES:[/b] Separates hoods from masks making them wearable together or apart in any combination.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15052]Apophysis Dragon Priest Masks[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4707]Psychosteves Dragon Priest Masks[/url] FRIENDLY! No clipping issues!

[b]WARNINGS:[/b]
Use ONLY ONE version! If you are going to use Psychosteves Dragon Priest Masks, please note that there is a mistake in textures path.
To make it work (not only with this mode):
1. download NMM version 2.1 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4707/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D4707&pUp=1]Psychosteves Dragon Priest Masks[/url]
2. install it
3. go to "data/textures/armor" and rename folder dragonpriestmasks -> dragonpriesthelm
If you are going to use Sky Re patch, mind that you need of the the main downloads depending on what texture mod you want to use.
[b]DISCLAIMER:[/b] Please understand that regardless of "no clipping" statement there will always be minor ones with some armor/cloth types because of the nature of games mechanic. I will do my best to eliminate all issues that could be eliminated, but I can't do impossible. Thank you.

Known issues:
1. Konahrik mask still has clipping with some hoods just because it's made so. Can't do much about that except replace it with other mask model.
2. SkyRe seems to have compatibility issues with this mod, reported by several users (look comments for details).

Wearable with any hood or without one. Basically you can wear it with anything, but items for circlet slot.

Hoods for wear apart from masks added (separate .esp). Currently can get only with console.
1. Open console.
2. Type for each hood: player.additem "item's id" 1

dragon priest hood = xx000d62
Konahrik's hood = xx000d64

xx - is position in your load order. Use Help console command to find out.
author: mluppov

files.name: Real Dragonpriest Masks
